SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM EVENT
WHERE EVENT_TITLE LIKE '%${title}%' OR EVENT_CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'
WHERE EVENT_TITLE LIKE '%${title}%'
WHERE EVENT_SUBTITLE LIKE '%${subTitle}%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT * FROM EVENT
WHERE EVENT_TITLE LIKE '%${title}%' OR EVENT_CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'
WHERE EVENT_TITLE LIKE '%${title}%'
WHERE EVENT_SUBTITLE LIKE '%${subTitle}%'
ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_SUBTITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_HIT, EVENT_REG_DATE, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE, EVENT_DRAW_DATE, EVENT_DISPLAY, EVENT_ENABLE, LAG(EVENT_TITLE,1,'이전글') OVER(ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) AS prevTitle, LAG(EVENT_INDEX, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(EVENT_INDEX, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) AS nextNum, LEAD(EVENT_TITLE,1,'다음글') OVER(ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) AS nextTitle FROM EVENT ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) result1 WHERE EVENT_INDEX=#{index}

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT EVENT_INDEX, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_SUBTITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_HIT, EVENT_REG_DATE, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE, EVENT_DRAW_DATE, EVENT_DISPLAY, EVENT_ENABLE, LAG(EVENT_TITLE,1,'이전글') OVER(ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) AS prevTitle, LAG(EVENT_INDEX, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(EVENT_INDEX, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) AS nextNum, LEAD(EVENT_TITLE,1,'다음글') OVER(ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) AS nextTitle FROM EVENT ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) result1 WHERE EVENT_INDEX=#{index}
